To celebrate the holiday ErrantWeb will be putting up a bunch of plans for sale! We have a specific page on our website just for this so you can monitor the sale, and see what plans are in stock and what ones are out of stock.

All of the VPS plans that are listed are LowEndTalk friendly at the under $7.00/m mark!


**To view the plans that are on sale you can go to our halloween sale page:**
http://errantweb.com/hs.php

If you have any questions you may post them below in the comments for this thread.

Test IP's and Locations are listed on the plans page. 


Regards,
